items.title: ‚å®Ô∏è Custom Keybinds Released!
items.content: Fully customize all toolbar keyboard shortcuts! Click any keybind in Settings to change it. Smart conflict detection automatically swaps keybinds when needed. Protected shortcuts (Undo/Redo/Delete) stay locked for consistency.

items.title: üö™ Free-Placement Door System!
items.content: Place doors anywhere on walls with 64px grid snapping! Doors now hide corner pillars automatically and persist through room merges, splits, moves, and rotations.

items.title: üè∞ Multi-Room Drag & Drop!
items.content: Select multiple modular rooms with Shift-click and move them all together! Tokens placed on rooms now follow automatically when you drag.

items.title: üõ†Ô∏è Toolbar Customization!
items.content: Customize your toolbar with 3 presets: Beginner (all tools), Advanced (focused), and Minimalistic (essentials). Your settings sync to the cloud!

items.title: üè∞ Modular Rooms Released!
items.content: Build dungeons with our new modular room system! Drag and drop floor tiles, connect rooms seamlessly, and customize with 3 wall styles. Rooms snap together automatically.

items.title: üöÄ Open Beta Phase 1
items.content: Welcome to Phase 1 of the open beta! This initial release has very limited content for testing core features. We're gathering feedback and polishing the experience.

items.title: üì¶ Beta 2.0 on the Horizon
items.content: Phase 2 is in development and will bring significantly more content - additional maps, tokens, room elements, and new features. Stay tuned!

items.title: üîê Discord Login Available!
items.content: You can now sign in with your Discord account for quick access to your campaigns.

items.title: üîë Google Sign-In Added
items.content: Sign in with your Google account for seamless access. Your campaigns sync automatically across devices.

items.title: ‚òÅÔ∏è Cloud Sync is Here
items.content: Your maps, tokens, and collections are now automatically saved to the cloud. Never lose your campaign progress again!

items.title: üèóÔ∏è Room Builder Released
items.content: Create custom rooms with floor textures and wall elements. Build dungeons, taverns, and any interior space you can imagine.

items.title: üé® Terrain Brush Tool
items.content: Paint terrain directly on your maps with the new terrain brush. Perfect for outdoor encounters and wilderness exploration.

items.title: üìÅ Token Collections
items.content: Organize your tokens into collections for quick access. Create themed sets for different campaigns or encounter types.

items.title: üéâ Welcome to DungeonPlan
items.content: The ultimate tool for planning your RPG campaigns. Create maps, manage encounters, and bring your adventures to life!
